"(The) US should keep its own house in order rather than scapegoat China. "

赵立坚会用smear campaigning on China吗？狐狸台都是China's Smear Campaign，不是China's Scapegoat Campaign，改一下后两个：

President Trump's tweet on Jan 24 claims that the US is greatly appreciated on China's efforts and its transparency. Then he said on March 13 that the data China shared are helpful for fighting the War on Coronavirus in America. The US should mind its own business rather than smear campaigning on China.

("mind ur pwn biz"? dat's crazy! u dont mind urs 2)

The CDC admitted that some patients of the Coronavirus outbreak were misdiagnosed as flu during the 2019 season, which sees millions infected and thousands died. If the outbreak started on last September, and the US has claimed lack of testing ability since, how many people are really infected by now? The US should investigate on the “Patient Zero” matter.
